sentences.en: After the pot is dipped in this mixture, it is fired.
sentences.cn: 这个壶在混合料里浸过之后，就进行烧制。

sentences.en: Any hostages in the firing line would have been sacrificed.
sentences.cn: 任何射击线上的人质就都会成为牺牲品。

sentences.en: Foreign banks are in the firing line too.
sentences.cn: 外国银行也在遭批之列。

sentences.en: He will be in charge of all hiring and firing at PHA.
sentences.cn: 他将负责公共房产管理局所有人员的雇用和解聘事务。

sentences.en: Murat had looked into the eyes of the firing squad without flinching.
sentences.cn: 穆拉特毫不退缩地直视着执行枪决的行刑队员们的眼睛。

sentences.en: New guns firing high explosive shells were incorporated into the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 发射高爆弹的新型大炮在战场上得到了使用。

sentences.en: The firing finally began to die away in the late afternoon.
sentences.cn: 到了临近傍晚时枪炮声终于渐渐停息。

sentences.en: There was continuous firing throughout the night.
They saw a big flash and a huge ball of fire reaching hundreds of feet into the sky.
sentences.cn: 他们看到一道强光和一个巨大的火球直冲天空达几百英尺。

sentences.en: They were disorientated by the smoke and were firing blindly into it.
sentences.cn: 他们在烟雾中迷失了方向，向里面胡乱射击了一通。

sentences.en: They were fooling around on an Army firing range.
sentences.cn: 他们在军队的射击训练场里闲晃。

sentences.en: They were under constant firing from the guns.
sentences.cn: 他们遭到枪林弹雨的不间断攻击。

sentences.en: Those put to death by firing squad included three generals.
sentences.cn: 行刑队处决的那些人里有3名将军。

sentences.en: We are having difficulty in firing up the ship's engines.
sentences.cn: 我们很难发动这艘轮船的引擎.

sentences.en: Within seconds the other soldiers began firing too.
sentences.cn: 几秒钟内，其他的士兵也开始射击。

sentences.en: You should cut the knot by firing them all.
sentences.cn: 你应该快刀斩乱麻,把他们统统解雇.

sentences.en: Young players found themselves too much in the firing line.
sentences.cn: 年轻球员总是发现自己备受责难。

trans.tran_en: When a pot or clay object is fired, it is heated at a high temperature in a special oven, as part of the process of making it
